compatibility.notes: CERN-OHL-W-2.0 allows for weak copyleft, meaning that while modifications to the original work must be shared under the same license, works that link to it may be licensed differently.

key_requirements: Ensure that any modifications made to the Covered Source are documented.
Treat any Source derived from the Covered Source as licensed under CERN-OHL-W or a Compatible Licence.
Do not imply endorsement by CERN when using the license.
license.name: CERN-OHL-W-2.0
obligations: Must disclose the source of the Covered Source when Conveying it.
Must include a copy of the license with any distribution of the Covered Source.
Must include copyright notices in any distribution of the Covered Source.
Must include notices of any changes made to the Covered Source.
